name: 1Heart
summary: A puzzle point-and-click game with horror themes. Story is that of a young girl looking for her sister.

name: 1 Hungry Peasant
summary:
1 Hungry Peasant must collect 100 Potatoes.

Created for Moonjam 2021: https://jam.moon2.tv/

name: 1 Hop
summary: Play as a rabbit and go looking for carrots and food bags avoiding the dog. Try to get the mountain first to become the ultimate rabbit, play split screen with your friend and work together to become the King Rabbit.

name: 1 Hit Kill
summary:
The bad guys take one hit... So do you!
This 80's-style Top-Down Shooter tests your patience!

name: 1HourPet
summary: A tiny pet in a bottle

name: 1-Hour Speedmapping 2018
summary:
This is the first in what may be a series of compilations of 1-hour speedmaps.
Maps must be built within a 1 hour time period. You can do testing and bug-fixing after the 1 hour period. The map must be in a playable state and have an exit. Boom and limit-removing (complevel 2+9) format maps allowed. It resulted in 33 maps done by various authors.
